title: Mega Pinball/Puyo Pop/Puzzle Bobble Set NDS/GBA Incl Emulato
description:
Massive pinball set for NDS & GBA + Puyo Puyo & Puzzle Bobble, and (bonus) Pacoman, supersized pacman game for GBA.  Includes up to date emulation package, all are tested and working.  (use kigb-win to open some of the older gb roms)

...** and for those who know & get it.. Forget Potemkin, is sunk like the battleship its named for, hahaha, :P..  and, yep, sorry to say a PSP on PC emu is prolly still yrs away.. (T_T)  ...oh well, at least u can now play all 3 of the games it supposedly plays (so far, ths remains to be seen, Potemkin appears to be completely useless..) and every variety available of them for the real handheld systems made by *drum roll* Nintendo (only not actually made by Nintendo, bwuhahahaha!) 

Cheers, and remember to seed. v(^_^)v
